## Week 1: Aug 21 - Aug 25

### Monday Aug 21

* Half day for 6th and 9th graders.

### Tuesday Aug 22

* **Entrance:** 
  * Getting-to-know-you survey
* **Objectives:** 
  * Get overview of class
  * Generate random numbers using a spreadsheet
* **Agenda:** 
  * Introductions
  * [Outline the class](https://chadworley.github.io/precalculus/unit_00_overview/slides_01/slides_01.pdf){target="_blank"}
* **Homework:**
  * None
  
### Wednesday Aug 23

* **Entrance:** 
  * calculate mean of integers between 1 and 6.
* **Objectives:** 
  * Calculate population mean from probability distribution using [online tool](https://chadworley.github.io/cltsim.html){target="_blank"}.
  * Calculare a $z$-score
  * Use random numbers to simulate a model.
  * Create histogram from data.
  * Differentiate between population and sample.
  * Make inference when observation and model don't align.
* **Agenda:** 
  * Questions: [population mean and $z$-score](https://chadworley.github.io/precalculus/unit_01_stats/week_01/002_practice/outcanvas/002_shared1.html){target="_blank"}.
  * [Dice rolling project](https://chadworley.github.io/precalculus/unit_01_stats/week_01/002_dice-rolling_project/002_dice-rolling_project.pdf){target="_blank"}
* **Homework:**
  * Finish the dice-rolling project
  
### Thursday Aug 24

* **Entrance**
  * When rolling 100d6, the expected total is $\text{ET}=350$ with a standard error of $\text{SE}=17$. When rolling the  3d-printed dice, our class rolled a total of $\sum x =448$ with $n=100$ rolls. Calculate a $z$-score. $$z = \frac{\sum x - \text{ET}}{\text{SE}} $$
* **Objectives:** 
  * Calculate standard-normal probabilities using [online tool](https://chadworley.github.io/sn.html){target="_blank"}.
* **Agenda:** 
  * [Standard-normal probability practice problems](https://chadworley.github.io/precalculus/unit_01_stats/week_01/003_z_prob/outcanvas/003_shared1.html){target="_blank"}
* **Homework:**
  * Finish practice problems
  
### Friday Aug 25

* **Entrance**
  * [/precalculus/unit_01_stats/week_01/ET_04/ET_04.html](/precalculus/unit_01_stats/week_01/ET_04/ET_04.html){target="_blank"}
* **Objectives:**
  * Calculate $p$-values using [online tool](https://chadworley.github.io/sn.html){target="_blank"}.
* **Agenda:** 
  * [$p$-value practice problems](https://chadworley.github.io/precalculus/unit_01_stats/week_01/004_p-value/outcanvas/004_shared1.html){target="_blank"}
* **Homework:**
  * Finish practice problems
